content: octopus by gnathalie2 materials g hook ww yarn i used red heart start 6 single_crochet in ring rd1 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 single_crochet rd2 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next around 18 single_crochet rd3 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet around 24 single_crochet rd4-7 single_crochet in each single_crochet around rd8 decrease 1 single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet around 18 single_crochet rd9 decrease 1 single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet around 12 single_crochet rd10 decrease 1 single_crochet around 6 single_crochet now for our favorite fold and single_crochet across both thicknesses- 3 single_crochet chain 31 skip 1st chain single_crochet in next 2-3 single_crochet in every few chains it s up to you the more single_crochet s you cram in each chain is the more curly the leg gets single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat this process till you have 8 legs note on this one stuff him before you close him up and i had to just single_crochet where ever i found a spot to fit all 8 legs he does not require perfection and glue google eyes on him or embroider eyes however you wanna do it
